entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a character who has found Hermione in an unlocked classroom.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as sitting on the teacher's desk, conjuring birds out of midair.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as enjoying the celebrations and being pulled into the room by Lavender.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is described as being pulled into the room by Ron.

relationships.description: Harry found Hermione in an unlocked classroom.
Harry is associated with Ron, as they are both mentioned together in the context of the party.
Hermione mentions Ron to Harry, indicating that they are aware of each other's presence.
Harry is associated with Lavender, as she is being pulled into the room by Ron.
Ron pulls Lavender into the room.
